devdoc.author: David Lucid <david@rari.capital> (https://github.com/davidlucid)
devdoc.details: This library handles deposits to and withdrawals from dYdX liquidity pools.

approve(address,uint256).details: Approves tokens to dYdX without spending gas on every deposit.

params.amount: Amount of the specified token to approve to dYdX.
params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token.

deposit(address,uint256).details: Deposits funds to the dYdX pool. Assumes that you have already approved >= the amount to dYdX.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be deposited.
params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token to be deposited.

getBalance(address).details: Returns the fund's balance of the specified currency in the dYdX pool.

params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token.

getBalances().details: Returns the fund's balances of all currencies supported by dYdX.
getBalances().return: An array of ERC20 token contract addresses and a corresponding array of balances.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Withdraws funds from the dYdX pool.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be withdrawn.
params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token to be withdrawn.

withdrawAll(address).details: Withdraws all funds from the dYdX pool.

params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token to be withdrawn.

devdoc.title: DydxPoolController
